Age: SOURCE: Social Security Administration, Master Beneficiary Record, 100 percent data.
Total children: NOTES: Because of differences in data sources and calculation methods, statistics reported in this table may differ from those reported by the Office of the Chief Actuary.
Children of—: Effective 2006, age is based on date of entitlement and not date of award. Entitlement can be retroactive and thus precede the date of award.
